@NightShiftMD I’ve been telling people this for weeks. We use N95 masks in pharmacy to prepare chemotherapy for our patients. If we can’t get N95 masks, patients won’t get their chemo. 
And if you haven’t been fit & trained how to wear, don & doff N95s, they’re useless & you’re wasting them.
